Actions.Name: Fist of Fury
Actions.Effects: Becomes a critical hit (+[D]) against dazed foes.

Actions.Name: Roundhouse Kick
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 1 in any direction, including diagonally.

Actions.Name: Temple Bell
Actions.Description: The Bell Warden ends their turn and gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, summon a temple bell in an adjacent space.

Summons.Name: Temple Bell
Summons.SummonEffects: When summoned, or when a character collides with it, releases a massive ringing. All characters in range 2 except the Bellkeeper must save or become dazed. Dazed characters take [D]+[fray] damage. This effect can't trigger more than once a round. Multiple bells can be summoned at once.
